mapper.insert: insert into userTable(userID, userPW, userName, userBirth, userPhone) values(#{userID}, #{userPW}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: select * from userTable where userID = #{userID} and userPW = #{userPW}
mapper.update: update userTable set userPW = #{userPW}, userPhone = #{userPhone} where userID = #{userID}
